title.en: Aspiration Prayer Related to the Stages of Trekchö Practice According to the Essence of the Profound Meaning of Ati, Great Perfection

text.en: Indivisible from the embodiment of all victorious ones, Lake-Born Vajra,
text.en-trans: gyal kün ngowo tsokyé dorjé dang

text.en: Is the venerable vidyādhara Terdak Lingpa,
text.en-trans: yermé rigdzin terdak lingpé zhab

text.en: Whose supreme activity of boundless compassion continues with
text.en-trans: gang gi tsemé tukjé trinlé chok

text.en: Mingyur Paldrön—Changeless Lamp of Splendour—to whom I bow in heartfelt respect.
text.en-trans: mingyur pal gyi drönmar nying né dü

text.en: May I delight in making the most of this support—human life, so hard to find,
text.en-trans: nyé ké ten la nyingpo len trowé

text.en: And, with the thought of death penetrating my heart, develop an uncontrived renunciation.
text.en-trans: chiwa nying zuk ngejung chömin gyi

text.en: With this, may I turn my mind toward practice by contemplating theduḥkhanature of saṃsāra, so hard to bear,
text.en-trans: zö ka khorwé duh khar lo dok té

text.en: And adopt and avoid unerringly according to the law of actions and their effects.
text.en-trans: lé dré langdor manor chöpar shok

text.en: The unmistaken sources of refuge are the three rare and sublime ones,
text.en-trans: lumé kyabné könchok nam sum la

text.en: In whom I take refuge to avoid straying onto an erroneous path.
text.en-trans: lokpé lam lé dok chir kyamdro dang

text.en: For all the beings who have continually sustained me with their kindness throughout all lifetimes, my kind old parents,
text.en-trans: tserab drin gyi kyangpé magen dror

text.en: May I cultivate bodhicitta that is complete with the four immeasurables.
text.en-trans: tsemé zhiden changchub sem jong shok

text.en: May the nectar of Vajrasattva purify downfalls, faults and obscurations.
text.en-trans: dorsem dütsi nyetung drib jang shing

text.en: And, by offering an inconceivable sky-like treasure, a maṇḍala of the four major continents,
text.en-trans: ling zhi ling tren lü dang longchö dang

text.en: The sub-continents, my body, possessions, and lucid awareness,
text.en-trans: rangrig rangsal mikmé namkhé dzö

text.en: May all defilements be cleansed and the twofold accumulation swiftly perfected.
text.en-trans: pulwé drib jang tsok nyi nyur dzok shok

text.en: Sublime one, embodiment of the three sources of refuge, who knows the path to liberation,
text.en-trans: kyab sum kündü tarpé lam khen chok

text.en: My root guru, Vajradhara in actuality,
text.en-trans: dorjé chang ngö tsawé lama la

text.en: Through the force of my supplication with sincere faith, physical, verbal, and mental,
text.en-trans: go sum zolmé depé soltab tü

text.en: May I receive the blessings of your boundless compassion.
text.en-trans: tsemé tuk jé jinlab lhongpar shok

text.en: May the compassionate potency of the guru’s four kāyas enrich my mind
text.en-trans: lama ku zhi tukjé nüpa gyé

text.en: And seal it as the essence of the natural state.
text.en-trans: ranggyü nyuk sem ngowor gyé tab té

text.en: May my three doors of body, speech and mind become indivisible from,
text.en-trans: go sum lamé dorjé nam sum dang

text.en: And of a single taste with, the three vajras of the guru.
text.en-trans: yermé ro chik ngang du gyurwar shok

text.en: Within the framework of the three samādhis,
text.en-trans: tingdzin nampa sum gyi khok pub té

text.en: May my body, a unity of emptiness and luminosity, appear clearly as Vajrasattva.
text.en-trans: rang lü saltong dorjé sempar sal

text.en: May my speech, subtle wind held in the great vase,
text.en-trans: ngak lung bumchen yi dé jung juk sum

text.en: And my mind, joining mental recitation, inhalation and exhalation with the three syllables, unite prāṇa and mantra.
text.en-trans: dru sum dang jar lung ngak yermé shok

text.en: Completing approach and accomplishment according to number, sign or duration,
text.en-trans: drar drak drak tong ngak su jongjé pé

text.en: Based on the meditation and recitation of the six syllables and hundred syllables,
text.en-trans: yik druk yikgyé dé gom la ten né

text.en: Through which all that is heard is purified into mantra’s empty sound,
text.en-trans: drang dü tsenmé nyendrub tarchin té

text.en: May whatever arises be sealed as the play of deity and mantra.
text.en-trans: gangshar lha ngak rolpar gyé teb shok

text.en: May sights and sounds become the state of emptiness beyond focal point,
text.en-trans: nang drak mimik tongnyi ngang du gyur

text.en: And, out of this emptiness, perfect in a single moment of recollection,
text.en-trans: tongnyi ngang lé kechik dren dzok su

text.en: May the kāya of the deity, the primordially perfect great seal,
text.en-trans: chu lé chubur zhindu lha yi kur

text.en: Manifest completely, like a water bubble from water.
text.en-trans: yé dzok chakgya chenpor ngöndzok shok

text.en: To put a stop to any association with  saṃsāra through the three doors,
text.en-trans: go sum khorwé dreltak chöpé chir

text.en: Through conduct that corresponds to the karmic appearances of saṃsāra’s six classes,
text.en-trans: rik druk khorwé lenang dang tünpé

text.en: May I recognise the faults of contaminated existence
text.en-trans: jachö la ten khorwé tsang tok té

text.en: And automatically let go of any attachment—physical, vocal or mental
text.en-trans: lü ngak yi sum zhenpa rang lok shok

text.en: May I purify habitual tendencies, the cause of confusion and seeds of saṃsāra,
text.en-trans: trul gyu khorwé sabön bakchak nam

text.en: Upon the basis of purification, the six points in the bodies of beings of the six classes,
text.en-trans: jang zhi drowa druk gi lü né druk

text.en: Where the syllables that serve as seeds for the six classes are what must be purified,
text.en-trans: jangja rik druk sabön yigé nam

text.en: By applying the union of fire and wind, the method of purification.
text.en-trans: jongjé lung mé jorwé dakpar shok

text.en: Whether discursive thought to be rejected or the most essential, virtuous dharma,
text.en-trans: pangja namtok nyingpo gewé chö

text.en: By settling naturally in the freshness
text.en-trans: gangshar dé la shepa tsechik tu

text.en: Of single-pointed awareness of whatever arises,
text.en-trans: rangbab soma nyi du zhakpa yi

text.en: May I accomplish meditative stability on the basis of my three doors.
text.en-trans: go sum zhi tok samten drubpar shok

text.en: While allowing the mind to remain relaxed and uncontrived,
text.en-trans: rangsem machö lhukpar nepa dé

text.en: By adopting peaceful, intermediate and wild comportment,
text.en-trans: chölam zhi dang barma tsubmo yi

text.en: Through circumstances, progressive guidance and training,
text.en-trans: kyen dang rimpar tri ching gompar lab

text.en: May I develop confidence in calm, stability and liberation.
text.en-trans: neten drolwé ding nyi ngöngyur shok

text.en: Through applying the key points of body, speech and mind—
text.en-trans: lü ngak yi kyi né nam lek chün té

text.en: Adopting postures with thebody, usingspeechto chant "Hūṃ!"
text.en-trans: lü kyi jé ching ngak gi hung dang dang

text.en: And investigatingmind’s birth and cessation, coming and going—
text.en-trans: semnyi kyé gak dro ong ta depé

text.en: May I recognise the fundamental nature, the very essence of awareness.
text.en-trans: neluk rigpé rang ngoshepar shok

text.en: In threefold motionlessness, may whatever manifests unceasingly
text.en-trans: mi yo sum la lodé dümajé

text.en: As the natural expression of uncompounded awareness beyond the mind
text.en-trans: rang tsal magak chargo chir nang kün

text.en: Unfold in a state beyond elaboration as indivisible emptiness and clarity,
text.en-trans: nangtong yermé chu dang da zuk zhin

text.en: The union of appearance and emptiness, like the moon’s reflection in water.
text.en-trans: saltong yermé trödral ngang né shok

text.en: May I realise the natural state beyond contrived meditation,
text.en-trans: duk sum duk nga tsok druk yulnang kün

text.en: In which whatever arises as the three or five poisons
text.en-trans: gangshar rigpa ching drol lé depa

text.en: Or as objects of the six senses is allowed to settle naturally
text.en-trans: rangbab trödral kadak ying dzokpé

text.en: And perfectly as primordially pure space, free of elaboration.
text.en-trans: gom jelé dé neluk tokpar shok

text.en: Swiftly perfecting all the qualities of the stages and paths,
text.en-trans: salam yönten malü nyur dzok té

text.en: May I realise my true primordial face, Samantabhadra,
text.en-trans: kunzang dömé rang zhal ngöngyur ching

text.en: Become a protector for all beings as infinite in number as space is vast,
text.en-trans: khakhyab drowé gönpo nyi gyurpé

text.en: And gain the fortune to accomplish twofold benefit spontaneously.
text.en-trans: dön nyi lhün gyi drubpé pal tob shok

text.en: If I am unable to achieve liberation in this lifetime,
text.en-trans: detar tsé dir drolwar magyur na

text.en: May I find the confidence to master the bardo.
text.en-trans: bardor rang jen chüpé ding nyé ching

text.en: However, should such recognition be lacking, may I miraculously take birth
text.en-trans: der ngoma trö rangzhin tulkü zhing

text.en: In the heart of a lotus in a naturally manifest nirmāṇakāya pure realm.
text.en-trans: pemé nyingpor dzü té kyewar shok

text.en: May I be courageous and with an ocean of merit
text.en-trans: dé lé jewa trak gyé namrol ni

text.en: Manifest hundreds of millions of magical forms
text.en-trans: gang dul möpé pal du yong shar té

text.en: To save infinite beings from the ocean of saṃsāra,
text.en-trans: tayé dro nam khor tso lé drolwé

text.en: Each according to their capacity and interest.
text.en-trans: nyingtob sönam gyachen tobpar shok

text.en: Kyema!May the hosts of gurus, yidam deities and ḍākinīs,
text.en-trans: kyema lama yidam khandrö tsok

text.en: Grant their blessings, so that all these aspirations I have made
text.en-trans: dak gi jitar sampé dön nam kün

text.en: May be accomplished quickly without the slightest difficulty.
text.en-trans: kawa mepar nyurdu drub gyurwé

text.en: Let such accomplishment be granted, right here and now!
text.en-trans: jin gyi labpé ngödrub dü dir tsol
